latest.title: Hydrous - Mutabor
latest.description: As in a long-forgotten fairy tale, Mutabor transforms you like a magical spell. With this outing, sound wizard Hydrous pushes the boundaries of deep hypnotism into uncharted territories full of bewitching sounds and epic atmospheres, which will alter your mind and purify your soul.

skogsro.title: Skogsro
skogsro.description: Released october 2020 on the American label Stereoscenic Records.

ikigai.title: Ikigai
ikigai.description: Released february 2020 on the Norwegian label Molt.

elements.title: Elements
elements.description: Released november 2021 on Swedish/Norwegian label Navigare Audio
